title: The cheapest chatbot solution SymeChat
content:
SymeChat takes advantage of Llama2 7B’s powerful natural language understanding and generation abilities to enable chatbots, virtual assistants and other AI applications with human-level conversational skills. By leveraging Llama2 7B in the cloud, SymeChat eliminates the need for customers to purchase expensive GPU hardware or deal with the complexities of maintaining and updating neural networks themselves. Customers will pay based on monthly usage without any upfront infrastructure costs.

News: https://syme.dev/articles/news/0
GitLab: https://gitlab.com/SymeCloud/syme-chat
Amazon AWS: https://aws.amazon.com/marketplace/pp/prodview-gzehsbllm3q3o

For SymeChat 7B. The software license is currently $4.99/month, unlimited instances, and AWS cloud cost depends on your usage. It’s around $0.083/hour if you don’t have AWS saving plan. The cost will be down to around $0.02~$0.04/hour if your AWS saving plan is available.
